plot: Jean wakes up in a bathtub full of ice in an abandoned garage. He is tied to a rope with surgical tools surround him. But something far worse awaits.
title: Invectum
plot_es: Jean wakes up in a bathtub full of ice in an abandoned garage. He is tied to a rope with surgical tools surround him. But something far worse awaits.
plot_en: Jean wakes up in a bathtub full of ice in an abandoned garage. He is tied to a rope with surgical tools surround him. But something far worse awaits.
